alert.note: Alert for Scotts Bluff; Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 04 at 4:29PM CDT until September 04 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Scotts Bluff County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Southern Sioux County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... * Until 415 PM MDT. * At 328 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 15 miles southwest of Agate Bed National Monument to 8 miles east of Hawk Springs Campground, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Scottsbluff, Gering, Mitchell, Terrytown, Morrill, Lyman, Stegall, Agate Bed National Monument, Scotts Bluff National Monument, Hubbard Hill, Scottsbluff Airport, Lake Alice and Henry. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
